dcterms:description: The REDS dataset comprises 240 videos of resolution 720 Ã— 1,280 captured by GoPro, with each video consisting of 100 high-resolution frames. It is used for training and testing video super-resolution models.
dcterms:title: REDS

dcterms:creator: C. Liu
D. Sun
dcterms:description: The Vid4 dataset contains 4 videos used for testing video super-resolution methods. It serves as a benchmark for evaluating the performance of super-resolution algorithms.
dcterms:title: Vid4
